discussion_comments.comment_body:
<!-- metadata:{"confidence":9,"steps":[]} -->
Inconsistent key naming for Data Store i18n entries; both 'dataStore' (camelCase) and 'data.store'/'data.stores' (dot notation) are used. Use a consistent naming convention for maintainability.

<details>
<summary>Prompt for AI agents</summary>

```
Address the following comment on packages/frontend/@n8n/i18n/src/locales/en.json at line 2785:

<comment>Inconsistent key naming for Data Store i18n entries; both 'dataStore' (camelCase) and 'data.store'/'data.stores' (dot notation) are used. Use a consistent naming convention for maintainability.</comment>

<file context>
```

     "test:frontend": "turbo run test:frontend --concurrency=1",
     "test:nodes": "turbo run test:nodes --concurrency=1",
+    "test:docker": "pnpm --filter=n8n-playwright run test:standard",

discussion_comments.comment_body:
These sound a bit off to me. The `test:docker` runs playwright tests right? Could it be `test:e2e` or `test:playwright`?

And does `test:report` report something to somewhere? Or show a report? Would `test:show:report` be more meaningful? Wondering if this one should be in the playwirght package instead/as well?

Let me analyze the code changes carefully.","toolCalls":[{"args":{"pattern":"packages/frontend/@n8n/i18n/src/locales/*.json"},"toolName":"listFiles"}]},{"text":"Let me check if there are any other related files that might be affected by this change:","toolCalls":[{"args":{"pattern":"**/*contextMenu*.ts*"},"toolName":"listFiles"}]},{"text":"Let me try to find where context menu items are defined or used:","toolCalls":[{"args":{"command":"grep -r \"contextMenu\\\\.\" packages/frontend --include=\"*.ts\" --include=\"*.vue\" | head -20"},"toolName":"executeCommand"}]},{"text":"Let me check the specific file where the context menu is defined:","toolCalls":[{"args":{"command":"grep -r \"filter_executions_by\" packages/frontend --include=\"*.ts\" --include=\"*.vue\""},"toolName":"executeCommand"}]},{"text":"Let me check the actual implementation in the useContextMenu.ts file:","toolCalls":[{"args":{"command":"grep -A 10 -B 5 \"filter_executions_by\" packages/frontend/editor-ui/src/composables/useContextMenu.ts"},"toolName":"executeCommand"}]},{"text":"Now I need to check the actual locale key in the en.json file:","toolCalls":[{"args":{"command":"grep -A 2 -B 2 \"contextMenu.FilterExecutionsBy\" packages/frontend/@n8n/i18n/src/locales/en.json"},"toolName":"executeCommand"}]},{"text":"Let me check if there are any other references to this key in the codebase:","toolCalls":[{"args":{"command":"grep -r \"contextMenu.filter_executions_by\" packages/frontend --include=\"*.ts\" --include=\"*.vue\""},"toolName":"executeCommand"}]}]} -->

```suggestion

```
